introTextBeforeStartButton.comments: Introductory text displayed before the start button

startButton.comments: Start button to begin the survey

consentCheckbox.comments: Checkbox for user to provide consent

consentPDFLink.comments: Link to PDF file explaining the survey and data collection

introTextAfterStartButton.comments: Additional introductory text displayed after the start button

introFooterLinks.comments: Links and contact information in the intro footer

accessCode.comments: Access code provided to participants to access the survey

householdSize.comments: Number of people in the household, always compare to household.members[] length

householdCarNumber.comments: Number of cars in the household

householdTwoWheelNumber.comments: Number of two-wheelers in the household

homeAddress.comments: Civic number and street address of the household

homePostalCode.comments: Postal code of the household (format depends on country/region)

homeCarNumberElectric.comments: Number of electric cars in the household

homeCarNumberPluginHybrid.comments: Number of plug-in hybrid cars in the household

homeEbikeNumber.comments: Number of e-bikes in the household

homeCarParkings.comments: Types of car parkings available at the household

householdAtLeastOnePersonWithDisability.comments: Indicates if at least one person in the household has a disability, needed to know if we ask for each person later on

householdAtLeastOneCarSharingMember.comments: Indicates if at least one person in the household is a member of a carsharing service, used to know if we ask for each person later on

householdAtLeastOneCarSharingUser.comments: Indicates if at least one person in the household is a user of a carsharing service, used to know if we ask for each person later on

householdAtLeastOneBikesharingUser.comments: Indicates if at least one person in the household uses a bikesharing service

householdAtLeastOneBikesharingMember.comments: Indicates if at least one person in the household is a member of a bikesharing service

personNickname.comments: Nickname for the person (only if more than 1 person in household)

personOccupation.comments: Occupation of the person (only for non-worker, non-student)

personSchoolType.comments: Type of school (old version: enrolledInSchool) (only for age 16-), subject to discussion for max age

personDrivingLicenseOwner.comments: Indicates if the person owns a driving license (only for age 16+)

personTransitPassOwner.comments: Indicates if the person owns a transit pass

personTransitPasses.comments: Types of transit passes owned by the person

personCarsharingUser.comments: Indicates if the person uses carsharing services

personCarsharingMember.comments: Indicates if the person is a member of a car-sharing service

personBikesharingUser.comments: Indicates if the person uses bike-sharing services

personBikesharingMember.comments: Indicates if the person is a member of a bike-sharing service

personHasDisability.comments: Indicates if the person has a disability

personIsParatransitUser.comments: Indicates if the person is a user of paratransit services

personIsParatransitMember.comments: Indicates if the person is a member of paratransit services

personStudiesFromFixedLocation.comments: Indicates if the person studies from a fixed location

personWorksFromFixedLocation.comments: Indicates if the person works from a fixed location

personWorkOnTheRoad.comments: Indicates if the person works on the road

personJobCompatibleWithRemoteWork.comments: Indicates if the person's job is compatible with remote work

personWorkPlaceName.comments: Name of the person's work place

personWorkPlaceNameQueryString.comments: Query string used to geolocate the person's work place

personWorkPlaceGeography.comments: Geographic location of the person's work place

personWorkPlaceParking.comments: Parking availability at the person's work place

personSchoolPlaceName.comments: Name of the person's school place

personSchoolPlaceQueryString.comments: Query string used to geolocate the person's school place

personSchoolPlaceGeography.comments: Geographic location of the person's school place

personSchoolPlaceParking.comments: Parking availability at the person's school place

personDaysAtWorkPerWeek.comments: Number of days per week the person works at their work place

personDaysRemoteWorkPerWeek.comments: Number of days per week the person works remotely

personDaysAtSchoolPerWeek.comments: Number of days per week the person attends school at their school place

personDaysRemoteSchoolPerWeek.comments: Number of days per week the person attends school remotely

personEducationalAttainment.comments: Educational attainment level of the person

personDidTripsOnTripsDate.comments: Indicates if the person made trips on the specified trips date

personNoWorkTripOnTripsDateReason.comments: Reason for not making work trips on the specified trips date

personNoSchoolTripOnTripsDateReason.comments: Reason for not making school trips on the specified trips date

personNoWorkTripOnTripsDateReasonSpecify.comments: Specification of the reason for not making work trips if 'Other' is selected

personNoSchoolTripOnTripsDateReasonSpeci.comments: Specification of the reason for not making school trips if 'Other' is selected

personHasOmittedTrips.comments: Indicates if the person has omitted trips in their reporting

selectPerson.comments: Allows selecting a specific person from the next section

activePersonTitle.comments: Displays the title for the active person, including their nickname

personWhoWillAnswerForThisPerson.comments: Indicates who will answer the section for the selected person

visitedPlacesIntro.comments: Introductory text for the visited places section

journeyDeparturePlaceIsHome.comments: Indicates if the departure place for the journey is home

journeyDeparturePlaceOther.comments: Type of the departure place if it is not home

visitedPlaceActivityCategory.comments: Category of the activity performed at the visited place, usually not asked, but infered from activity

visitedPlaceActivityPre.comments: Pre choice for activity selection (to reduce number of choices)

visitedPlaceActivity.comments: Specific activity performed at the visited place

visitedPlaceActivitySpecify.comments: Specification of the activity if 'Other' is selected

visitedPlaceOnTheRoadDepartureType.comments: Type of on-the-road departure for the visited place

visitedPlaceOnTheRoadArrivalType.comments: Type of on-the-road arrival for the visited place

visitedPlaceAlreadyVisited.comments: Indicates if the place has already been visited during the journey

visitedPlaceShortcut.comments: Shortcut to select a previously visited place, by same person or another household member

visitedPlaceGeography.comments: Geographic location of the visited place

visitedPlacePreviousPreviousDepartureTim.comments: Departure time from the place before the previous visited place

visitedPlacePreviousArrivalTime.comments: Arrival time at the previous visited place

visitedPlacePreviousDepartureTime.comments: Departure time from the previous visited place

visitedPlaceArrivalTime.comments: Arrival time at the current visited place

visitedPlaceNextPlaceCategory.comments: Category of the next place to visit

visitedPlaceDepartureTime.comments: Departure time from the current visited place

segmentModePre.comments: Pre-selection of mode group to reduce choices for segment mode

segmentModeCategory.comments: Category of the segment mode, inferred from the selected mode

segmentMode.comments: Mode of transportation for the segment

segmentVehicleOccupancy.comments: Number of people in the vehicle for the segment

segmentJunctionName.comments: Name of the junction or interchange point for the segment

segmentJunctionQueryString.comments: Query string used to search for the junction or interchange point

segmentJunctionGeography.comments: Geographic location of the junction or interchange point

segmentJunctionParkingType.comments: Type of parking at the junction or interchange point

segmentJunctionParkingPaymentType.comments: Type of payment for parking at the junction or interchange point

segmentBridgesTunnels.comments: Indicates if bridges or tunnels were used during the segment

segmentMotorways.comments: Indicates if motorways were used during the segment

segmentIsNotLast.comments: Indicates if the segment is not the last one in the trip

segmentBusLines.comments: Bus lines used during the segment

segmentJunctionSubwayStation.comments: Subway station at the junction or interchange point, was startStation and endStation and transferStations in previous surveys, must be moved to junction

segmentTrainLines.comments: Train lines used during the segment, was not asked in previous surveys

segmentSubwayLines.comments: Subway lines used during the segment

segmentJunctionTrainStation.comments: Train station at the junction or interchange point, was startStation and endStation in previous surveys, must be moved to junction

segmentJunctionREMStation.comments: REM station at the junction or interchange point, was startStation and endStation in previous surveys, must be moved to junction

segmentDriver.comments: Driver of the vehicle for the segment (if applicable)

segmentSameModeAsReverseTrip.comments: Indicates if the same mode was used for the reverse trip

segmentBusLinesWarning.comments: Warning message related to bus lines, needs trRouting/transition running

householdHasAtLeastOneChildInSharedCusto.comments: Indicates if the household has at least one child in shared custody

didRespondForCorrectAssignedDate.comments: Indicates if the respondent answered for the correct assigned date

didNotRespondForCorrectAssignedDateReaso.comments: Reasons for not responding for the correct assigned date
Specification of other reasons for not responding for the correct assigned date

wouldLikeToParticipateInOtherSurveys.comments: Indicates if the respondent would like to participate in other surveys

wouldLikeToParticipateInOtherSurveysCont.comments: Contact email for participating in other surveys

complexityOfTheSurvey.comments: Complexity of the survey rated on a scale

timeSpentAnswering.comments: Perception of time spent answering the survey (in minutes)

inclinedToAbandonSurvey.comments: Indicates if the respondent was inclined to abandon the survey

inclinedToAbandonSurveySections.comments: Sections where the respondent was inclined to abandon the survey

inclinedToAbandonSurveyReasons.comments: Reasons why the respondent was inclined to abandon the survey
